definition: gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
disciple/apprentice/believer/on foot/bare or empty/to no avail/only/prison sentence

sentences.english: I asked your disciples to drive out the spirit, but they could not.
sentences.chinese: 我请过你的门徒把鬼赶出去，他们却是不能。

sentences.english: When his disciples heard it, they were exceedingly amazed, saying, Who then can be saved?
sentences.chinese: 门徒听见这话，就希奇得很，说，这样谁能得救呢。

sentences.english: Then the disciples looked one on another, doubting of whom he spake.
sentences.chinese: 门徒彼此对看，猜不透所说的是谁。

sentences.english: I too loved my closest disciple although we were not beloveds .
sentences.chinese: 我也爱著我最亲近的门徒，尽管我们不曾是爱人。

sentences.english: Then it would seem that the disciples went back to their fishing for a short period.
sentences.chinese: 之后，门徒似乎有一段短时间回去作捕鱼的老本行。

sentences.english: And the disciples were called Christians first in Antioch.
sentences.chinese: 门徒称为基督徒，是从安提阿起首。

sentences.english: The courtyard was filled with his disciples as well as many Brijbasis.
sentences.chinese: 庭院里坐满了他的门徒还有许多布如阿佳居民。

sentences.english: Both were running, but the other disciple outran Peter and reached the tomb first.
sentences.chinese: 两个人同跑，那门徒比彼得跑得更快，先到了坟墓。

sentences.english: Our goal is to lead people to know Jesus and "make disciples of all nations".
sentences.chinese: 本会的目标是领人归主及使万民作主的门徒。

sentences.english: Then said Jesus unto his disciples, Verily I say unto you, That a rich man shall hardly enter into the kingdom of heaven.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣对门徒说，我实在告诉你们，财主进天国是难的。

sentences.english: Jesus even entrusted her to return and tell the disciples about his resurrection.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣甚至是让她回去告诉他的门徒自己复活了。
为有效的门徒训练祷告。

sentences.english: Jesus taught his disciples to hunger for God's kingdom and righteousness.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣也教导祂的门徒要饥渴慕义。

sentences.english: After his death,Jesus appeared to his disciples in Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣死后，在耶路撒冷向门徒显现。

sentences.english: Peter therefore went forth, and that other disciple, and came to the sepulchre.
sentences.chinese: 彼得和那门徒就出来，往坟墓那里去。

definition: to lecture on doctrine/to expound the wisdom of ancient sages/to preach/a sermon
disciple/apprentice/believer/on foot/bare or empty/to no avail/only/prison sentence
Holy Son/Jesus Christ/God the Son (in the Christian Trinity)
to die for a just cause
Holy Father/God the Father (in the Christian Trinity)
God (in Catholicism)/abbr. for 天主教[Tian1 zhu3 jiao4], Catholicism
